dcterms:description: The LLFF Dataset consists of eight scenes captured with a handheld cellphone, with 20-62 images each. The resolution of each image in the dataset is 4032 × 3024. Due to the limited capacity of NVIDIA RTX 2080Ti, we downsized each image 1/8 scale to 504 × 378 dimensions in pixels, and held out 1/8 of these as the test set for novel view synthesis.
dcterms:title: LLFF Dataset

dcterms:creator: A. Dai
A. X. Chang
M. Savva
M. Halber
T. Funkhouser
M. Niesner
dcterms:description: The ScanNet dataset consists of richly-annotated 3D reconstructions of indoor scenes. For evaluation, we selected eight scenes in the ScanNet dataset to evaluate our method. In each scene, 40 images were selected to cover a local region, and all images were resized to 648 × 484.
dcterms:title: ScanNet
